Name: Marcela Esteve
Description:
Marcela was stabbed in January, and died in hospital 20 days later. Gocella Paul Sebastia, 31, was subsequently arrested.

"Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide" research project: AG Magazine, 03.02.2010

Name: Derya
Description:
Derya was found dead in her bedroom with her throat cut and multiple knife stab wounds to her face and body.

http://www.bianet.org/english/minorities/119958-transgender-derya-y-killed-in-antalya

Name: "Maurício" da Silva Correia
Description:
The  victim  was  stabbed  27  times.  The  police  declared  that  the perpetrator was a psychopath.

TvT Partner Organization: Grupo Gay da Bahia (Tabelas 2010)

Name: "Felipe" Torrealba Castillo
Description: "Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide" research project: Diario El Impulso, 17.02.2010

Name: Aycan Yener
Description:
Aycan was killed in her apartment in the Fatih area of Istanbul. Her throat was slit, and she was stabbed 17 times.

The assailants also stabbed her roommate, Seyhan Özmemiş, aged 32, who survived. Witnesses reportedly observed three people fleeing the scene, but no one has been arrested.

Istanbul LGBTT http://www.istanbul-lgbtt.org/

https://www.coe.int/t/Commissioner/Source/LGBT/TurkeyLegal_E.pdf
